verbose_text: MDSCs promote the recruitment and expansion of other suppressor cells (regulatory T cells, Treg), leading to impaired innate effector natural killer (NK) cells and inhibition of T cell proliferation and activation, further downregulating antitumor immune surveillance that subsequently influence leukemia development and progression.
evidence: killer (NK) cells and inhibition of T cell proliferation and activation, further downregulating antitumor immune surveillance
